text: Sunvära SK is a sports club in Sunvära in Sweden. It was established on 4 January 1943. The club runs bandy. It plays its home games on Sjöaremossen's artificial ice rink. The activity originally consisted of bandy, racewalking, skiing and track and field athletics. Since the 1950s the club only runs bandy. The women's bandy team has played three seasons in the Swedish top division. == References == ==Other websites== *Official website Category:1943 establishments in Sweden Category:Athletics clubs in Sweden Category:Bandy clubs in Sweden Category:Ski clubs in Sweden
title: Sunvära SK
